greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers k such that 7*k! - 1 is prime.
link: Index entries for sequences related to numbers of primes of the form k*n!+-1
mathematica: fQ[n_] := PrimeQ[7 n! - 1]; k = 0; lst = {}; While[k < 1501, If[ fQ@k, AppendTo[lst, k]; Print@k]; k++ ]; lst
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 13 2010
